title: For Sale-T206 Cy Young Portrait SGC 5 **sold**

posts.post_title: For Sale-T206 Cy Young Portrait SGC 5 **sold**
posts.post_content: For Sale- T206 Piedmont Cy Young Portrait SGC 5. PayPal f/f preferred. Pm or text at 8153436260 if interested. The last comp for this card was an off centered Piedmont SGC 5 that sold at Heritage Auctions this month for 9k.
